issue.title: [Python] Address docstrings for ChunkedArray class, methods, attributes and constructor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15429](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15429). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ensure all docstrings of class ChunkedArray, the functions and the constructor have an `Examples` section:
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.ChunkedArray.html#pyarrow.ChunkedArray>
 \* <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.chunked_array.html#pyarrow.chunked_array>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15429?focusedCommentId=17518836) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12754
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12754>
